body.name: connection-persistence
body.description: Handling established connections when installing a new policy.

body.name: forward-to-other-sam-servers
body.description: Forward SAM clients' requests to other SAM servers.

body.name: purge-when-size-reaches-to
body.description: Purge SAM File When it Reaches to.

body.name: global-settings-mode
body.description: Whether to override global settings or not.

body.name: fail-mode
body.description: Fail mode - allow or block all requests.

body.name: auto-generate-ip
body.description: Use an automatically generated IP address for the Gateway object (applies only to Smart-1 Cloud).

body.name: auto-topology-use-custom-recalculation-time
body.description: Auto topology to use custom recalculation time instead of default.

body.name: override-profile
body.description: Whether to override the Server (Check Point Host) object configuration.

body.name: value
body.description: according-to-topology: Use the original or translated IP address of the server based on the Topology of Security Gateway interfaces.original-ip-only: Use only the original IP address of the servertranslated-ip-only: Use only the translated IP address of the server.

body.name: enable-https-inspection
body.description: Enable HTTPS Inspection after defining an outbound inspection certificate. To define the outbound certificate use outbound inspection certificate API.

body.name: hit-count
body.description: Hit count tracks the number of connections each rule matches.

body.name: value
body.description: Override value.Required only for 'override-profile' is True.

body.name: deployment-mode

body.name: radius
body.description: Radius server object identified by the name or UID. Must be set when "authentication-method" was selected to be "radius".

body.name: ip-address
body.description: Optional: IP address for the web portal to use, if your DNS server fails to resolve the main portal URL. Note: If your DNS server resolves the main portal URL, this IP address is ignored.

body.name: main-url
body.description: The main URL for the web portal.

body.name: base64-certificate
body.description: The certificate file encoded in Base64 with padding. This file must be in the *.p12 format.

body.name: base64-password
body.description: Password (encoded in Base64 with padding) for the certificate file.

body.name: allow-access-from
body.description: Allowed access to the web portal (based on interfaces, or security policy).

body.name: detect-using-x-forward-for
body.description: Whether to use X-Forward-For HTTP header, which is added by the proxy server to keep track of the original source IP.

body.name: action
body.description: If packets will be rejected (the Prevent option) or whether the packets will be monitored (the Detect option).

body.name: exclude-packets
body.description: Don't check packets from excluded network.

body.name: dynamic-ip
body.description: The Topology of interface with Dynamic IP is set to Automatic - External.

body.name: ip-address
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address. If both addresses are required use ipv4-address and ipv6-address fields explicitly.

body.name: network-mask
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 network mask. If both masks are required use ipv4-network-mask and ipv6-network-mask fields explicitly. Instead of providing mask itself it is possible to specify IPv4 or IPv6 mask length in mask-length field. If both masks length are required use ipv4-mask-length and ipv6-mask-length fields explicitly.

body.name: auto-calculated
body.description: Security Zone is calculated according to where the interface leads to.

body.name: topology-settings
valid_values: network defined by the interface ip and net mask

body.name: interface-leads-to-dmz
body.description: Whether this interface leads to demilitarized zone (perimeter network).

body.name: ip-address-behind-this-interface
valid_values: network defined by the interface ip and net mask

body.name: color
body.description: Color of the object. Should be one of existing colors.

body.name: details-level
body.description: The level of detail for some of the fields in the response can vary from showing only the UID value of the object to a fully detailed representation of the object.

body.name: ignore-errors
body.description: Apply changes ignoring errors. You won't be able to publish such a changes. If ignore-warnings flag was omitted - warnings will also be ignored.

body.name: interfaces-topology-settings
body.description: Topology setting for all interfaces on a Security Gateway. Default for Security Gateways that run Gaia OS: 'per interface'. Default for Quantum Spark gateways that run Gaia Embedded OS: 'global and automatic'. Changing this setting is supported only for Quantum Spark gateways.

body.name: ip-address
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address. If both addresses are required use ipv4-address and ipv6-address fields explicitly.

body.name: bypass-all-under-load
body.description: Disable/enable all IPS protections until CPU and memory levels are back to normal.

body.name: bypass-track-method
body.description: Track options when all IPS protections are disabled until CPU/memory levels are back to normal.

body.name: activation-mode
body.description: Defines whether the IPS blade operates in Detect Only mode or enforces the configured IPS Policy.

body.name: send-threat-cloud-info
body.description: Help improve Check Point Threat Prevention product by sending anonymous information.

body.name: ips-update-policy
body.description: Specifies whether the IPS will be downloaded from the Management or directly to the Gateway.

body.name: nat-hide-internal-interfaces
body.description: Hide internal networks behind the Gateway's external IP.

body.name: auto-rule
body.description: Whether to add automatic address translation rules.

body.name: ip-address
body.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address. If both addresses are required use ipv4-address and ipv6-address fields explicitly. This parameter is not required in case "method" parameter is "hide" and "hide-behind" parameter is "gateway".

body.name: hide-behind
body.description: Hide behind method. This parameter is forbidden in case "method" parameter is "static".

body.name: install-on
body.description: Which gateway should apply the NAT translation.

body.name: one-time-password
body.description: Shared password to establish SIC between the Security Management and the Security Gateway.

body.name: aliases
body.description: List of URL aliases that are redirected to the main portal URL.

body.name: ip-address
body.description: Optional: IP address for the web portal to use, if your DNS server fails to resolve the main portal URL. Note: If your DNS server resolves the main portal URL, this IP address is ignored.

body.name: main-url
body.description: The main URL for the web portal.

body.description: The certificate file encoded in Base64 with padding. This file must be in the *.p12 format.

body.name: use-custom-proxy
body.description: Use custom proxy settings for this network object.

body.name: rtm-counters-report
body.description: Enables monitoring blades system counters report (e.g CPU Usage,Memory Usage).

body.name: rtm-traffic-report-per-connection
body.description: Enables Monitoring blade traffic report per connection.

body.name: save-logs-locally
body.description: Save logs locally on the gateway.

body.name: threat-prevention-mode
body.description: The mode of Threat Prevention to use. When using Autonomous Threat Prevention, disabling the Threat Prevention blades is not allowed.

body.name: enabled
body.description: State of the web portal (enabled or disabled). The supported blades are: {'Application Control', 'URL Filtering', 'Data Loss Prevention', 'Anti Virus', 'Anti Bot', 'Threat Emulation', 'Threat Extraction', 'Data Awareness'}.

body.name: aliases
body.description: List of URL aliases that are redirected to the main portal URL.

body.name: ip-address
body.description: Optional: IP address for the web portal to use, if your DNS server fails to resolve the main portal URL. Note: If your DNS server resolves the main portal URL, this IP address is ignored.

body.description: The main URL for the web portal.

body.name: dmz

body.name: vpn

body.name: certificate-authority
body.description: Certificate authority to enroll from. Identified by the Name or UID.

body.name: distinguished-name
body.description: The Distinguished Name of the certificate. If the certificate-authority type is "external", the Distinguished Name must start with "CN=".

body.name: enrollment-type
body.description: Weather to enroll certificate manually or automatically. Editable only if the Certificate Authority's automatic enrollment is enabled.

body.name: stored-at
body.description: Store keys on Security Management Server or on the Gateway. Default value is "management server". On cluster object only "management server" is valid.

body.name: next-hop-ip
body.description: The IP address of the next hop.

body.name: static-nat-ip
body.description: The NATed IPv4 address that hides the source IPv4 address of outgoing connections (applies only to IPv4).

body.name: ip-version
body.description: The IP version of the interface's IP address (IPv4/IPv6).

body.name: next-hop-ip
body.description: The IP address of the next hop.

body.name: static-nat-ip
body.description: The NATed IPv4 address that hides the source IPv4 address of outgoing connections (applies only to IPv4).

body.description: The IP version of the interface's IP address (IPv4/IPv6).

body.name: next-hop-ip
body.description: The IP address of the next hop.

body.name: static-nat-ip
body.description: The NATed IPv4 address that hides the source IPv4 address of outgoing connections (applies only to IPv4).

body.name: ip-version
body.description: The IP version of the interface's IP address (IPv4/IPv6).

body.name: next-hop-ip
body.description: The IP address of the next hop.

body.name: static-nat-ip
body.description: The NATed IPv4 address that hides the source IPv4 address of outgoing connections (applies only to IPv4).

body.name: ip-version
body.description: The IP version of the interface's IP address (IPv4/IPv6).

body.name: dns-resolving-hostname
body.description: DNS Resolving Hostname. Must be set when "ip-selection" was selected to be "dns-resolving-from-hostname".

body.name: ip-address
body.description: IP Address. Must be set when "ip-selection" was selected to be "use-selected-address-from-topology" or "use-statically-nated-ip".

body.name: mode
body.description: Office Mode Permissions. When selected to be "off", all the other definitions are irrelevant.

body.name: group
body.description: Group. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "office-mode-permissions" was selected to be "group".

body.name: radius-server
body.description: Radius server used to authenticate the user.

body.name: allocate-method
body.description: Using either Manual (IP Pool) or Automatic (DHCP). Must be set when "use-allocate-method" is true.

body.name: manual-network
body.description: Manual Network. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "allocate-method" was selected to be "manual".

body.name: dhcp-server
body.description: DHCP Server. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "allocate-method" was selected to be "automatic".

body.name: virtual-ip-address
body.description: Virtual IPV4 address for DHCP server replies. Must be set when "allocate-method" was selected to be "automatic".

body.name: dhcp-mac-address
body.description: Calculated MAC address for DHCP allocation. Must be set when "allocate-method" was selected to be "automatic".

body.name: primary-dns-server
body.description: Primary DNS Server. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "use-primary-dns-server" is true and can not be set when "use-primary-dns-server" is false.

body.name: first-backup-dns-server
body.description: First Backup DNS Server. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "use-first-backup-dns-server" is true and can not be set when "use-first-backup-dns-server" is false.

body.name: second-backup-dns-server
body.description: Second Backup DNS Server. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "use-second-backup-dns-server" is true and can not be set when "use-second-backup-dns-server" is false.

body.name: primary-wins-server
body.description: Primary WINS Server. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "use-primary-wins-server" is true and can not be set when "use-primary-wins-server" is false.

body.name: first-backup-wins-server
body.description: First Backup WINS Server. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "use-first-backup-wins-server" is true and can not be set when "use-first-backup-wins-server" is false.

body.name: second-backup-wins-server
body.description: Second Backup WINS Server. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "use-second-backup-wins-server" is true and can not be set when "use-second-backup-wins-server" is false.

body.name: ip-lease-duration
body.description: IP Lease Duration in Minutes. The value must be in the range 2-32767.

body.name: support-multiple-interfaces
body.description: Support connectivity enhancement for gateways with multiple external interfaces.

body.name: perform-anti-spoofing
body.description: Perform Anti-Spoofing on Office Mode addresses.

body.name: anti-spoofing-additional-addresses
body.description: Additional IP Addresses for Anti-Spoofing. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "perform-anti-spoofings" is true.

body.name: support-l2tp
body.description: Support L2TP (relevant only when office mode is active).

body.name: l2tp-auth-method
body.description: L2TP Authentication Method. Must be set when "support-l2tp" is true.

body.name: l2tp-certificate
body.description: L2TP Certificate. Must be set when "l2tp-auth-method" was selected to be "certificate". Insert "defaultCert" when you want to use the default certificate.

body.name: allow-vpn-clients-to-route-traffic
body.description: Allow VPN clients to route traffic.

body.name: nat-traversal-service
body.description: Allocated NAT traversal UDP service. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "support-nat-traversal-mechanism" is true.

body.name: visitor-mode-service
body.description: TCP Service for Visitor Mode. Identified by name or UID. Must be set when "support-visitor-mode" is true.

body.name: visitor-mode-interface
body.description: Interface for Visitor Mode. Must be set when "support-visitor-mode" is true. Insert IPV4 Address of existing interface or "All IPs" when you want all interfaces.

body.name: vpn-domain
body.description: Gateway VPN domain identified by the name or UID.

body.name: vpn-domain-exclude-external-ip-addresses
body.description: Exclude the external IP addresses from the VPN domain of this Security Gateway.

body.name: alert-when-free-disk-space-below
body.description: Enable alert when free disk space is below threshold.

body.name: alert-when-free-disk-space-below-threshold
body.description: Alert when free disk space below threshold.

body.name: alert-when-free-disk-space-below-type
body.description: Alert when free disk space below type.

body.name: before-delete-keep-logs-from-the-last-days
body.description: Enable before delete keep logs from the last days.

body.name: before-delete-keep-logs-from-the-last-days-threshold
body.description: Before delete keep logs from the last days threshold.

body.name: delete-index-files-older-than-days
body.description: Enable delete index files older than days.

body.name: delete-index-files-older-than-days-threshold
body.description: Delete index files older than days threshold.

body.name: delete-index-files-when-index-size-above
body.description: Enable delete index files when index size above.

body.name: delete-index-files-when-index-size-above-threshold
body.description: Delete index files when index size above threshold.

body.name: delete-when-free-disk-space-below
body.description: Enable delete when free disk space below.

body.name: delete-when-free-disk-space-below-threshold
body.description: Delete when free disk space below threshold.

body.name: detect-new-citrix-ica-application-names
body.description: Enable detect new Citrix ICA application names.

body.name: distribute-logs-between-all-active-servers
body.description: Distribute logs between all active servers.

body.name: forward-logs-to-log-server
body.description: Enable forward logs to log server.

body.name: forward-logs-to-log-server-name
body.description: Forward logs to log server name.

body.name: forward-logs-to-log-server-schedule-name
body.description: Forward logs to log server schedule name.

body.name: perform-log-rotate-before-log-forwarding
body.description: Enable perform log rotate before log forwarding.

body.name: reject-connections-when-free-disk-space-below-threshold
body.description: Enable reject connections when free disk space below threshold.

body.name: rotate-log-by-file-size
body.description: Enable rotate log by file size.

body.name: stop-logging-when-free-disk-space-below
body.description: Enable stop logging when free disk space below.

body.name: stop-logging-when-free-disk-space-below-threshold
body.description: Stop logging when free disk space below threshold.

body.name: update-account-log-every
body.description: Update account log in every amount of seconds.

success.name: exclude-packets
success.description: Don't check packets from excluded network.

valid_values: network defined by the interface ip and net mask

success.name: interfaces-topology-settings
success.description: Topology setting for all interfaces on a Security Gateway. Default for Security Gateways that run Gaia OS: 'per interface'. Default for Quantum Spark gateways that run Gaia Embedded OS: 'global and automatic'. Changing this setting is supported only for Quantum Spark gateways.

success.description: Disable/enable all IPS protections until CPU and memory levels are back to normal.

success.description: Track options when all IPS protections are disabled until CPU/memory levels are back to normal.

success.name: nat-hide-internal-interfaces

set-simple-gateway.request:
POST {{server}}/set-simple-gateway
Content-Type: application/json
X-chkp-sid: {{session}}

{
  "name" : "test_gateway",
  "vpn" : true,
  "application-control" : true,
  "url-filtering" : true,
  "ips" : true,
  "anti-bot" : true,
  "anti-virus" : true,
  "threat-emulation" : true,
  "nat-hide-internal-interfaces" : true,
  "icap-server" : true
}

set-simple-gateway (remove Enhanced Link.description: Modifies an existing gateway with Enhanced Link Selection Interfaces (Remove Action)

set-simple-gateway (set Enhanced Link Se.description: Modifies an existing gateway with Enhanced Link Selection Interfaces (Set Action)

set-simple-gateway with an addition to f.description: Fetch is done according to the order of the list, targets are always added at the end of the list
